original_text: If you keep my commands, you will remain in my love, just as I have kept my Father’s commands and remain in his love.
korean_text: 내가 아버지의 계명을 지켜 그의 사랑 안에 거하는 것 같이 너희도 내 계명을 지키면 내 사랑 안에 거하리라

sentences.original_text: you will remain in my love
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 내 사랑 안에 머무를 것이라

sentences.original_text: just as I have kept my Father's commands
